div.p: No. 850, vol. 1868/P S, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letter dated 25 January 1868.
[Dr Muellers suggestions for disposal of the Camels lately used by the Ladies Leichardt Search Committee]
See also M to J. McCulloch, 15 April 1868; M to J. McCulloch, 17 April 1868 (in this edition as 68-04-17a); M to J. McCulloch, 20 May 1868 (in this edition as 68-05-20a); and M to J. McCulloch, 20 January 1869 (in this edition as 69-01-20a).
